member.postal_address: Office 801, 47A Evelpidon & 33 Lefkados Str., GR-113 62 Athens, Greece

shortcv.p: Eirini Kalliamvakou is a research assistant at the Athens University of Economics and Business in ELTRUN (the e-Business Center) and is currently working in the GUIDE project (funded by the EU). She has also been accepted as a PhD candidate in November 2004 in the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB). Eirini holds a Bachelor in Economics from the University of Athens and an MSc in Decision Sciences (specialization in e-Business) from the Athens University of Economics and Business. Her research interests concern the evolution of open source software development communities and networks, issues that arise in such a context as well as the digital identity of a citizen in the eGovernment environment (her work within the project).
